anchorMove.name: Power Thief
anchorMove.description: When you touch someone skin to skin, you may roll +Mythos:
hold: Use an expert mundane skill or language they possess for the rest of the scene
Make 1 use of one of their Mythos or Logos moves
Prevent them from using their Mythos or Logos move
Make another Mythos roll for Power Thief without needing to touch them again

flaw.name: A bit more than I bargained for
flaw.description: You may adopt one of the target's personality quirks to take a -1 ongoing to any relevant rolls for the scene to mark Attention on your Mythos

additionalMoves.name: Perfect Illusion
additionalMoves.description: When you touch someone or something with your skin, you may roll +Mythos:
hold: Take his/her/its perfect likeness for the rest of the scene
Mimic their voice, speech patterns, and mannerisms for the rest of the scene
Make the size of the illusion bigger or smaller than human sized
Make another Mythos roll for Perfect Illusion without needing to touch them again

flaw.name: Look, but don't touch!
flaw.description: If the shape of an Illusion does not match the shape of the caster, touching the Illusion will dispel it with a shock

anchorMove.name: I Know a Guy/Gal
anchorMove.description: Once per session, you may Work your Connections without choosing a contact already on your sheet. Pick a name and expertise, then roll +Logos, and follow the outcomes as per Work your Connections. On a 10+, you may add that Connection to your sheet as though you had rolled a 7 on Cultivate a Contact.

flaw.name: You hurt those you are no longer interested in
flaw.description: On any interaction with someone you've used in the past, you may describe the bad blood between you and the person. Take -1 ongoing for any interactions in this scene to mark Attention on your Logos.

additionalMoves.name: It's All In My Backpack
additionalMoves.description: Anytime you need a mundane item that could reasonably fit in a backpack, roll +Logos:

outcomes.7-9: You have the thing, but it is slightly off somehow. The MC will tell you how
outcomes.6-: You have it, but it is very off. The MC will tell you how at the worst possible moment

flaw.name: Bit of a Klepto
flaw.description: Anytime something shiny crosses your path that seems like you should have it, either take it to feed the need, or take 1 Stress to suppress the urge. In either case, mark 1 Attention to your Logos

additionalMoves.name: I Know Every Part of this City (Skillset: Area Knowledge)
additionalMoves.description: On any roll where you can justify how knowledge of the city would be relevant, roll the better of +Logos or (+Attribute+1)

flaw.name: Old Haunts
flaw.description: When visiting familiar places that remind you of your past, you may take 1 Stress to mark Attention on your Logos

equipment.name: Backpack
equipment.tags: See It's All In My Backpack Move
